about.title: About the KÁVES brand
about.description: KÁVES is a proud Czech company bringing self-service coffee stations. Premium, freshly ground coffee from our own Czech roastery, modern design and operation without employees. Everything we produce with emphasis on quality, tradition and honest Czech work.

vendingMachines.title: Vending machines
vendingMachines.subtitle: Vending machines are outdated, use powder and are not able to provide a quality drink
disadvantages: Use questionable ingredients and low-quality, tasteless coffee powder
No uniqueness - similar machines are on every corner

kaves.title: KÁVES
kaves.subtitle: Be your own barista - prepare your own coffee using syrups and toppings
advantages: New market format and premium design
Excellent taste of freshly roasted coffee beans from Czech roastery
Payment is made through card/mobile payments

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about KÁVES coffee stations

questions.question: What is the investment?
questions.answer: From 180,000 CZK when buying a coffee machine. For rental, we start from 0 CZK initial investment with monthly fee. We also offer profit sharing model.

questions.question: How much will I earn?
questions.answer: Usually 12–48,000 CZK monthly, depending on location and traffic. Earnings depend on number of coffees sold and local conditions. We'll help you find the ideal location.

questions.question: Do I need to operate the coffee machine?
questions.answer: No, we service and supply everything for you. Our technicians regularly refill coffee, clean machines and take care of technical operation.

questions.question: Is water needed?
questions.answer: No, the coffee machine has its own filter and tank. Only electrical outlet and 1 m² of space needed. Water tank is refilled during service visits.

questions.question: How long is the payback period?
questions.answer: Typically 2–6 months depending on location traffic. At busy locations, payback can be even faster.

questions.question: What are the operating costs?
questions.answer: Low electricity consumption (15 kWh/month), service and supplies included in price. Total monthly costs about 1,500 CZK.

questions.question: Can I choose the type of coffee?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer selection from our premium blends from our own roastery. We can customize the offer to your customers.

questions.question: How does payment for coffee work?
questions.answer: Coffee machine accepts card, mobile and cash payments. All transactions are automatically recorded and you receive clear reports.
